formalpara.title: Internal help for this AMI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: SIPshowpeer Synopsis: Show SIP peer (text format) Privilege: system,all Description: Show one SIP peer with details on current status. Variables: Peer: <name> The peer name you want to check. ActionID: <id> Optional action ID for this AMI transaction.
